Text: Welcome to EUbusiness Welcome to EUbusiness the daily independent European business and information resource Dear Richard Thank you for registering with Europes fastestgrowing community of business professionals interested in news and information about the European Union Please keep this message for future reference as I am sure you will find it helpful in finding your way around the service We aim to provide you with fast and easy access to the whole range of EU legislation and policies which are likely to affect business in your industry sector We also provide you with the facilities to link up with like minded businessmen and women as well as EU information professionals consultants and experts to help you make the best use of the information we provide EUbusiness main features EUbusiness Week Our free weekly email newswire keeps you fully uptodate with key EU developments such as news legislation contract opportunities documents and events likely to affect your business Brought direct to your desk by the start of business every Friday pastnewsindexhtml EMUbusiness Our free twicemonthly newswire on EMU and the euro edited by Marion Bywater keeps you informed on euroarea governments decisions in fields such as tax accounting and introduction of notes and coins To receive this you will need to update your EUbusiness membership profile at profile and click on the My Services tab EUbusiness subscription service Our subscription service allows you to access our uptotheminute newsfeed provided by AFP the worlds oldest established news agency with comprehensive coverage of the key events in the EU as well as early alerts as to what is happening behindthescenes in Brussels afpnews the EUbusiness archive of over stories including all our stories over two weeks old restrictedrestrictedarchivehtml Inside the EU Our daily news from the European Union is categorised into sectors where you can find news background information and web links directly relevant to your business and interests EU Institutions euinstitut Agriculture agri Competition competit Consumers consumer Economic Monetary Union emu Employment employ Energy energy Environment environ Facts Figures factsfig Finance finance Food Drink fooddrin Living Working livingwo Media Communications mediacom Pharmaceuticals Health pharma Research Development rd Social Policy social Trade trade Transport transpor Finance Visit the Finance Business Community for news and info on the European Central bank the euro sources of EU finance as well as markets stocks and shares and our currency converter finance EU Countries Demographic economic trade and tax information for the EU and EU candidate countries as well as selected web links westerneuropeindexhtml easterneuropeindexhtml Tenders A daily selection of contract opportunities from the Official Journal of the European Communities OJS supplied by Tenders Electronic Daily tenders PressZONE Publish your own news and EU information articles directly onto EUbusiness PressZONE is an ideal way to promote your companys services to EUbusiness worldwide audience of over consultants national government and European Union officials and high level business people from around the world interested in EU affairs presszone Jobs If you are looking for a new job or are a recruitment agency or direct employer looking for a costeffective route to quality candidates check out our CareerZONE directory which we hope will become a comprehensive source of European Unionrelated human resources and training vacancies on the Internet cgisiteeubjobscgi Consultants directory If you are a member of a consultancy or a law firm specialising in EU affairs your EUbusiness membership entitles you to a free basic listing in our Consultants Directory You can enhance your listing for a very reasonable fee cgisiteeubconsultantscgi EUbusiness Search Engine You can search our site for news and information or search our comprehensive directory of EUrelated web links indexed every day so the results remain focused and uptodate search Business forum If youre looking for a business partner buyer agent supplier or a new job visit our businesstobusiness forum discussion Any Answers Answer questions or post your own in our Any Answers section helpanyanswers Poll Let us know your views by voting in our regular polls at poll How to get in touch Customer Service is available from am pm Monday to Friday in the UK and can be contacted as follows mailto Tel Fax The editors of the service are Wendy Jones and Nick Prag mailto mailto If you want to read more about the service or about the other services that we provide click on the Help button available from the home page Our aim is continual improvement in the EUbusiness service You can help us by telling your colleagues and friends about it Please make use of the opportunities it offers and let us know if you have suggestions for making our service even better Welcome to EUbusiness Regards Nick Prag Managing Director EUbusiness Ltd Your way through the EU information maze
